idea-plugin.name: Translation +
idea-plugin.description:
Translate anything to 120+ languages !
Choose an API: Google Translate, DeepL, Microsoft Translator, ChatGPT !
Works with all Jetbrains products ! No API key request for Google Translate

• Select some text to localize inside editor
  or write a word in your native language and translate it immediatly !
• Use “Translation” view to select translation input and ouput language
• Use “Dictionary” view to display full definition of selected word (english only)

CTRL+T : Ask for translation (or menu “Edit > Translate”)
CTRL+ALT : Ask for word definition (or menu “Edit > Search definition”)

TIPS:
 • Works even without API key (i.e Google Translate)
 • Supports file encoding for: HTML, JSON, CSV, XML, PROPERTIES
 • Supports styles: “CamelCase”, “SNAKE_CASE”, “snake_case” !
 • Smart replacement everywhere using refactoring :)
 • Adapt keyboard shortcuts in settings

Editor localization :

  • Select anything in editor (java, scala, kotlin, whatever !)
  • Go to menu “Edit > Translate”, or use CTRL+T
  • Check translation
  • Go to menu “Edit > Apply Translation”, or use CTRL+T, or click on translation hint !


Coding and translating as you go :

  • Start coding, write in your native language
  • Click CTRL+T
  • Check translation
  • Click CTRL+T to apply translation !


Commit dialog translation :

  • Enter commit message in your native language
  • Click “Translation” button
  • Check translation
  • Click “Apply translation” !


Translation view :

  • Select anything in editor (java, scala, kotlin, whatever !)
  • Go to “Translation” view
  • Select input and output language
  • Click “Translate”, check translation, then click “Replace selection”


Dictionay view :

  • Select anything in editor (javascript, gherki, text...)
  • Go to “Dictionary” view
  • Click “Search definition”


Settings :

  • Choose Google Translate, DeepL, Microsoft Translator, ChatGPT...
